name: Pink (XianXian)
description:
My first Twine game for #myfirstgamejam. I went into this project with no central idea, so there is no plot, just a stream of writing. Let me know if there are any issues with the game such as typos, grammar, or function. This was a great experience, I thank all the people who hosted this jam and Lysander for the Twine advice, check out his Twine games! Thanks you all.

Twine games from the 1.4 engine do not work in Google Chrome so you're going to have to use it on Internet Explorer/Microsoft Edge.
